name: War Machine Golem
description: The War Machine Golem is a massive construct designed for battlefield dominance, with strong, powerful limbs and a heavy armored exterior.
memorable: Its exceptional melee strength and ability to deal double damage to objects make it a terrifying presence in any siege.
goals: To serve as a relentless combatant on the battlefield, targeting fortifications and enemy forces.
relations: Often found guarding important locations or serving as a protector for more powerful beings.
environment: Typically encountered in war zones or near fortifications.
strengths: High durability, immunity to nonmagical attacks, and immense physical power.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it less agile, and negligible intelligence limits strategic capabilities.
attacks: Can perform powerful slam attacks and hurl boulders with a catapult action, alongside a devastating fire breath.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath creates a wide area of effect, dealing heavy fire damage to enemies caught in the cone.
senses: Standard darkvision up to 60 feet and a basic passive perception of 10.
additional_information: Immune to spells that would alter its form.
Resistant to magic due to its Magic Resistance ability.
Can only be damaged by adamantine weapons for nonmagical damage.
Has a siege ability that allows for significant damage to structures.
Cannot be affected by charm or fear effects.
